{{cpp/types/traits/is| 1=is_member_object_pointer
| description= 
Checks whether {{tt|T}} is a non-static member object pointer. Provides the member constant {{tt|value}} which is equal to {{c|true}}, if {{tt|T}} is a non-static member object pointer type. Otherwise, {{tt|value}} is equal to {{c|false}}.
| inherit_desc={{tt|T}} is a pointer to member object
}}

===Possible implementation===
{{eq fun
 | 1=
template&lt;class T&gt;
struct is_member_object_pointer : std::integral_constant&lt;
                                      bool,
                                      std::is_member_pointer&lt;T&gt;::value &amp;&amp;
                                      !std::is_member_function_pointer&lt;T&gt;::value
                                  &gt; {};
}}

===Example===
{{example
 | code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;type_traits&gt;

int main()
{
    class C {};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Is member object pointer?\n" &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha
              &lt;&lt; std::is_member_object_pointer_v&lt;int(C::*)&gt;
              &lt;&lt; ": int(C::*)\n"
              &lt;&lt; std::is_member_object_pointer_v&lt;int(C::*)()&gt;
              &lt;&lt; ": int(C::*)()\n";
}
|output=
Is member object pointer?
true: int(C::*)
false: int(C::*)()
}}
